casebody.data:
Donnie Lavan STREAT, Sr., Plaintiff-Appellant, v. Richard S. THOMPSON, in his Individual Capacity, Defendant-Appellee. No. 05-10152.

Non-Argument Calendar

D.C. Docket No. 04-00156-CV-1. United States Court of Appeals, Eleventh Circuit. May 12, 2005. Robert Scot Kraeuter, Savage, Turner, Pinson & Karsman, Savannah, GA, for Plaintiff-Appellant. Hugh B. Mcanatt, McNatt and Greene, Vidalia, GA, Michael J. Bowers, Joshua *108Archer, Balch & Bingham, Christopher S. Anulewicz, Meadows, Ichter & Trigg, P.C., Atlanta, GA, for Defendant-Appellee.

Before BLACK, PRYOR and GODBOLD, Circuit Judges.

PER CURIAM.

After reviewing the district court’s complete and detailed order, we find this appeal without merit.

AFFIRMED.
